description:
Need help moving that couch into your new apartment? Have delivery needs for your business? Want to get that gift delivered immediately? Don’t stress over your next move or haul - Buddytruk is here for you! 

Buddytruk connects you with a local, background checked and insured driver to help you move your items and deliver them to your desired drop-off location. No more having to bug your friends to help you move, rent a clunky box truck, or hire an expensive moving service.

A whole new way to look at moving and delivery:

-  Peace of Mind - All Buddytruk drivers go through an extensive DMV and background check so you can rest assured you’re being helped by the best of the best
-  You’re Covered - Up to $1M excess liability insurance
-  5 Star Service - Drivers are rated by passengers after every delivery so you know how great your buddy truly is
-  No Huss, No Fuss - You’ll never have to worry about scheduling a move our haul again. Connecting with a driver is as easy as tap of a button from your iPhone
-  Budget Friendly - With our payment algorithm, based on time and distance, you’ll never have to overspend on moving and hauling ever again

Buddytruk is moving and hauling, just a whole lot easier and friendlier!

---
Please note continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
